alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Inland Dixie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 7:13PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dixie County through 815 PM EDT... At 713 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bell to 14 miles south of Fowlers Bluff. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Horseshoe Point, Suwannee, Horseshoe Beach, Shamrock, Cross City Airport, Shired Island, Old Town, Eugene, Fletcher, Yellow Jacket and Fanning Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
